overview: Whether they participate in the frolics or not, certain people can’t find anything more pleasing than to watch their partner enjoying someone else. For his 40th anniversary, Marc Dorcel has decided to offer you some of the most arousing candaulism scenes filmed in the course of these past 40 years. 3h20, 9 scenes and 11 actresses, here’s the chance you were dreaming of to discover or rediscover the history of the inventor of French Pornochic.
title: 40th Anniversary : Candaulism
